hero.title: Discover. Understand.
hero.description: Where science education meets real-world impact. Join us on a mission to build a smarter, greener tomorrow.

history.title: Publication History
history.current: Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education (Volume 15 Issue 1, 2019 - current)
history.former: International Journal of Environmental and Science Education with ISSN 1306-3065 (Volume 1 Issue 1, 2006 - Volume 14 Issue 9, 2019)
history.note: Starting Volume 19 Issue 1 (2023), the journal is published by Modestum.

journal.title: Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education
journal.description1: The Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education (ISSN: 2633-6537) publishes original research articles from throughout the world in the fields of sciences education and environmental education.
journal.description2: IJESE adopts an Open Access policy complying with the definition laid out by the Budapest Open Access Initiative (BOAI) and is published quarterly by Modestum DOO, Serbia. All published manuscripts apply the Terms and conditions of Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.
journal.openAccessText: Following the Budapest Open Access Initiative (BOAI) for maximum visibility and impact.
journal.cooperationText: In partnership with the Cyprus Centre for Environmental Research and Education (CYCERE).

footer.description: Medical Research Journal publishes peer-reviewed open-access journals for the scientific community worldwide.

contact.title: Contact
contact.address: Modestum DOO, Bulevar Zorana Đinđića 125D, floor 1, flat 12C, 11070 Belgrade, SERBIA
contact.supportNote: For questions about manuscripts or articles in production, please contact

aimsHero.title: Aims & Scope
aimsHero.p1: The Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education (IJESE) publishes original, double‑blind peer‑reviewed articles from around the world in the fields of science and environmental education. We aim to provide scholars with a premier venue to share transformative ideas and evidence‑based practices.
aimsHero.p2: IJESE welcomes systematic reviews, meta‑analyses, empirical and theoretical studies, essays, commentaries, and case studies that advance scholarly understanding and promote sustainability‑oriented education.

about.title: About the Journal
about.description1: The Interdisciplinary Journal of Environmental and Science Education (IJESE) publishes original research from around the world in the fields of Science Education and Environmental Education.
about.description2: IJESE is an Open Access journal. Articles are published under the Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International license (CC BY 4.0), which allows use, redistribution, remixing, and commercial reuse with proper citation.
about.license: All content is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0).
